meanings.definition: Having a sour or astringent taste
meanings.sent1: The puckery lemon made my face scrunch up.
meanings.sent2: The green apple had a puckery flavor that made me pucker.
meanings.sent3: I tried the puckery vinegar and it made me make a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The puckery grapefruit was like a sour surprise in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The puckery taste of the unripe berry lingered on my tongue.
